title: Regarding Rorie's song
content:
I had to delete the topic due to ezBoard bugs, but here is what I was trying to post:

"Oh god...that was painful.

I did look up the lyrics though and it appears to be the theme song to Perfect Strangers: [url=http://www.tripletsandus.com/80s/tvtheme2.htm#Strangers]www.tripletsandus.com/80s...#Strangers[/url] "[url=http://spatang.com/ck][img]http://spatang.com/ck/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://spatang.com/cosmo][img]http://spatang.com/cosmo/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://spatang.com/nukem][img]http://www.spatang.com/nukem/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [img]http://spatang.com/scrobblersig.php[/img]
